Chile: Mapuches launch a general insurrection creating turmoil as far north as Maule River, far beyond the ordinary frontier.
Poland:
Deluge begins
Signing of the Union of Kėdainiai
Tyszowce Confederation formed
Russia: Swedish Deluge: Sweden invaded the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth. Russo-Polish War (1654–1667): Russian army captured Vilnius. Swedish Deluge: The voivode of Poznań surrendered to the Swedish invaders. Russia negotiated a ceasefire with Poland.
Taiwan: Ming loyalist Zheng Chenggong declares sovereignty over Chinese citizens in Taiwan
